siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Duet makes it really easy to record and remix music asynchronously with your friends and the world. This is in limited beta, feedback welcome!
blogPost.body: Duet makes it really easy to record and remix music asynchronously with your friends and the world. This is in limited beta, feedback welcome!
blogPost.title: Duet - Record music asynchronously really easily
blogPost.author: Mikey

localize.description: Duet让你真正轻松地与朋友和世界异步录制和混音音乐。这是在有限的测试，欢迎反馈
localize.tagline: 异步录制音乐真的很容易

localize.description: Duet讓你真正輕鬆地與朋友和世界異步錄製和混音音樂。這是在有限的測試，歡迎反饋
localize.tagline: 異步錄製音樂真的很容易

previous.excerpt: Increment.me is an easy way to get anonymous feedback about anything.
previous.title: Increment - Easily get anonymous feedback on anything.

localize.description: Increment.me是一个获取匿名反馈的简单方法。
localize.tagline: 轻松获得任何事情的匿名反馈。

localize.description: Increment.me是一個獲取匿名反饋的簡單方法。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆獲得任何事情的匿名反饋。

next.excerpt: Bitwit has the vision of making Bitcoin a commonly accepted currency. We enable Bitcoin holders to see where they can spent their money. Bitwit also helps people understand what their daily purchases cost in Bitcoin using the Bitcoin Daily feature.
next.title: Bitwit - Find companies that accept bitcoin as payment

localize.description: Bitwit的愿景是让比特币成为一种普遍接受的货币。我们让比特币的持有者能够看到他们的钱可以花在哪里。Bitwit还通过Bitcoin Daily功能帮助人们了解他们每天购买比特币的成本。
localize.tagline: 寻找接受比特币支付的公司

localize.description: Bitwit的願景是讓比特幣成爲一種普遍接受的貨幣。我們讓比特幣的持有者能夠看到他們的錢可以花在哪裏。Bitwit還通過Bitcoin Daily功能幫助人們瞭解他們每天購買比特幣的成本。
localize.tagline: 尋找接受比特幣支付的公司
